strategy: Adopt a time-dependent mixed strategy where the row player randomizes between coordinating on the "movie" option and the "sports" option based on the hour of the day. Specifically, if the time is between 6 PM and 8 PM, the row player chooses "movie" with 70% probability; otherwise, they choose "sports" with 70% probability. This leverages the behavioral pattern that couples often have different preferences based on time of day, introducing a subtle but exploitable structure in the game.
